title: Remove chat in games
body:
Either remove in game chat or make it so you cannot type more than 1 sentence every 5mins.

We have smart pings now,   in game chat creates toxic behavior and flaming starts. 

if 1 sentence every 5 mins was implemented it would reduce flaming because u cant continue arguing. 

also with this implemented = LESS CHAT  and MORE PLAY. number of games ive played and the "flamer" just types more than he does damage to the other team. 

Pls riot  HELP me to progress. reduce flaming.

replies.body:
Drag your chat box offscreen. Problem solved. Or "/mute all".  Just remember that there *are* players that use chat in a productive way, and you'll miss out on strategic decisions.

https://i.imgur.com/1HvNiEO.png?noredirect

true but sometimes you do get a team that talks tactics.

regardless just turn off all chat and ignore everyone in-game. simples.

Like what lmao hHah hope you dont crumble like that in real life if someone talks shit. How you gonna mute them
